ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups brown sugar, or as needed
1 (16 ounce) package bacon slices, cut into thirds (or as needed)

cookingTips: Wrap each sausage with a piece of bacon and secure with a toothpick before cooking
Cook on low in slow cooker for 3-4 hours, stirring occasionally, until bacon is crispy and brown sugar caramelizes
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How does the brown sugar caramelize and create a candy coating on this savory appetizer?
